attributes.action: Cancel all Council Tax Bill’s for 2020-2021 due to the Covid-19 outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: Business rates have been zero’d. Council tax should be also. The money households will save will be needed to pay for increased fuel usage at home and potentially increased food prices.
attributes.background: Cancel all council tax bills for this year into next.
